text:
Hi everyone

Please any one can help me which I was created careers job board through using HUBDB. I need to display the posts data related department category.

Please see the HUBDB screenshot
`<div class="container">`
    `<div class="section-title">`
       `<h2>{{ module.h2_title }}</h2>`
       `<h3 class="mt-5">{{ module.sub_title }}</h3>`
     `</div>`
   `<div class="section-description">`
     `{{ module.description }}`
   `</div>`





`<div id="page_container">`
  `<div id="accordion_search_bar_container">`
    `<input type="search" id="accordion_search_bar" placeholder="Cerca l'argomento" value="" onkeyup="this.setAttribute('value', this.value);">`
    `<a></a>`
  `</div>`
`<hr>`
`<div class="panel-group accordion_four" id="accordion" role="tablist" aria-multiselectable="true">`
  `{% set departments = hubdb_table_column(3691896, 'role_department').options %}`
   `{% set jobposts = hubdb_table_rows(3691896) %}`
      `{% for department in departments %}`
      `{% set type_list = type_list~department.id|list%}`
`<div class="panel" id="collapse{{loop.index}}_container">`
  `<div class="accordion-heading" role="tab" id="heading_{{loop.index}}">`
    `<h6 class="panel-title">`
      `<a role="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-parent="#accordion" href="#collapse{{loop.index}}" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="collapse{{loop.index}}">{{department.name}}</a>`
    `</h6>`
  `</div>`
  `<div id="collapse{{loop.index}}" class="panel-collapse collapse" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="heading_{{loop.index}}">`
    `<div class="panel-body">`
      `<div class="panel-group" id="accordionA">`
        `<div class="panel">`
          `<div>`
            `<div class="panel-body">`



               `{% for job in jobposts|reverse %}`

                 `{% if job.role_department.id == 2 %}`
                  `<div class="card p-0 f-cat mb-3 border-0 shadow-sm shadow--on-hover" >`
                  `<div class="card-body p-3">`
                  `<div class="row justify-content-between  align-items-center">`
                    `<div class="col-md-5 color--heading">`
                      `<div class="widget-job-title d-flex align-items-center">`
                        `{#<span class=" badge-circle text-white">{{ row.role_badge }}</span> {{row.hs_created_at}} hs_created_at|datetimeformat('%m.%d.%Y') #}`
                        `<a href="{{ job.link }}" target="_blank">{{ job.role_name }} </a>`
                        `{#<p class="m-0 p-0"><span class="text-muted time">3  days ago</span></p> #}`
                      `</div>`
                    `</div>`
                    `<div class="col-md-2 my-3 my-sm-0">`
                      `<div class="widget-job-info">`
                      `<p class="type m-0 p-0">{{job.job_type.name}} </p>`
                      `<p class="text-muted m-0 p-0">in <span class="location">{{job.city}}, {{job.country.name}}</span></p>`

                      `</div>`
                    `</div>`

                    `<div class="col-3 col-md-3 my-3 my-sm-0 text-center">`
                      `<div class="widget-job-category {{job.badge_style.name}}">`
                        `<i class="indicator bg-warning"></i>`
                        `<span>{{ job.role_department.name }} {{job.role_department.id}}</span>`
                      `</div>`
                    `</div>`
                    `<div class="col-2 col-md-2 my-3 my-sm-0 ">`
                      `<div class="widget-job-btn text-center">`
                         `<a href="{{ job.link }}" class="btn btn-secondary btn-sm" target="_blank">Apply Now</a>`
                      `</div>`
                    `</div>`
                   `{# <div class="d-none d-md-block col-1 text-center">`
                      `<small><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i></small>`
                    `</div> #}`
                  `</div>`
                `</div>`
              `</div>`

              `{% else %}`
                 `<div class="card p-0 f-cat mb-3 border-0 shadow-sm shadow--on-hover" >`
                    `<div class="card-body p-3">`
                    `No Records`
                 `</div>`
              `</div>`
               `{% endif %}`
              `{% endfor %}`

            `</div>`
          `</div>`
        `</div>`
      `</div>`
    `</div>`
  `</div>`

`</div>`
`{% endfor %}`
  `</div>`
`</div>`



  `</div>`
`</section>`
`<!-- End Hero -->`
